responses: The admission process for SRM Ramapuram requires candidates to meet eligibility criteria and take the SRMJEEE entrance exam. After filling out the online application form, qualified candidates attend a counseling session to select their courses based on exam ranks. Document verification and fee payment follow to secure admission. For updates and important dates, it's best to check the official SRM website click here.

responses: Applicant should have passed in Higher secondary examination (10, +2 pattern) or appearing in Higher Secondary examination in the current academic year with a minimum of 60% aggregate ( 3 subjects) in Physics (mandatory) , Mathematics (mandatory) and at least one of Chemistry / Biotechnology / Biology / Computer Science. Should have attained the age of 16 years and 6 months on the 31st July of the calendar year in which the 12th Board examination is to be held click here.

tell me the basic information about srm
responses: SRM Ramapuram, part of the SRM Institute of Science and Technology, is a premier educational institution in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, established in 2004. It offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in engineering, management, and the arts, supported by modern infrastructure and experienced faculty. The campus fosters a vibrant student community with numerous clubs and activities, while a dedicated placement cell helps connect students with leading companies for internships and job opportunities. Overall, SRM Ramapuram is committed to providing quality education and practical experience, preparing students for successful careers.
